techmeme.title: Google is offering its Google One AI Premium plan for free to US college students until spring 2026; students have until June 30, 2025, to sign up (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Global Payments shares plunge 15%+ and FIS shares jump 9%+ after Global Payments said it's buying Worldpay from FIS and GTCR and selling Issuer Solutions to FIS (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
Sources: Amazon plans to release its first TV streaming device with its Vega OS, used in some Echo devices, in 2025 and is courting publishers to add their apps (Janko Roettgers/Lowpass)
Sources: Tim Cook spoke to the US Commerce Secretary last week about how tariffs could affect iPhone prices before Trump exempted products from Apple and others (Washington Post)
LMArena says it's starting a company, whose corporate name will be Arena Intelligence, with plans to raise money, and releases a new beta version of its website (Rachel Metz/Bloomberg)
